note.snippet: Na taṃ yāce yassa piyaṃ jigīse
Yato ca kho bahutaraṃ, bhojanaṃ ajjhavāhari
Yāvatā candimasūriyā, pariharanti disā bhanti virocanā
Sabbeva dāsā mandhātu, ye pāṇā pathavissitā
Lābhāraho tāta tirīṭavaccho, dethassa bhogaṃ yajathañca
Yaso hāyati itthīnaṃ, tasmā tāta palāyahaṃ
Tenābhibhūto kapaṇaṃ rudāmi, mā heva maṃ pāṇasamaṃ jaheyya
Ayya na taṃ jahissāmi, kuñjaraṃ saṭṭhihāyanaṃ
ca kho naṃ pasaṃsanti, bhayā ukkaṃsayanti vā
Tasmā sabbena lokena, sandhiṃ katvāna ekato
Te dāni saṅgamma vasanti ekato, yatthaṭṭhitā duppasahajjame
na phāti hoti, na cāpi taṃ
Vajjāsi kho tvaṃ vāmūruṃ, ciraṃ kho sā karissati
Sā caṇḍī kāhati kodhaṃ, taṃ me tapati no idaṃ
Kāsikañca muduṃ vatthaṃ, tappetu dhanikā piyāti

note.original: daharopi taṃ na (sī. pī.), daharopi na (syā.)

note.snippet: Mā dāni maṃ maññi tuvaṃ yathā pure, jhānānuyutto viharāmi

note.original: neva hi taṃ ruheyya (sī. pī.), na hi taṃ virūhe (?)
note.snippet: Sacepi selasmi vapeyya bījaṃ, devo ca vasse na hi taṃ virūḷhe
